nodes.text: Llantho was a male Human who lived on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Llantho had a shop in the Anchorhead market, where he sold medium armor.

Llantho appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Medium Armor Vendor for Republic players on Tatooine. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Llantho was removed from the game along with the rest of the Medium Armor Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
